node.title: Welcome to Portumna
node.Body:
Portumna (Irish: Port Omna - meaning 'the landing place of the oak') is a market town in the south-east of County Galway, Ireland, on the border with County Tipperary.

The town is located to the west of the point where the River Shannon enters Lough Derg. This historic crossing point over the River Shannon between counties Tipperary and Galway has a long history of bridges and ferry crossings.

On the south-western edge of the town lie Portumna Castle and Portumna forest park.

(Info taken from WikiPedia).

This page is here only as to use as a sample for JSON for this Annertech blog post about creating apps with Drupal and Ionic.
node.Topics: Drupal, Ionic, Apps
